file_content.text: I've seen some powerful Sith at work, my lord. And you'd give just about all of them a run for their money.
Could have used a killer like you in black ops. Might've liked it. Didn't stand on rules and regulations, just bodies.
Never gave you Intelligence types much credit when it came to the real fighting. Glad to be wrong.
Victories outstripping defeats. Morale's out of the gutter. Logistics are in the black for the first time in years.
Tide's finally turning now.
Then it's time for the Empire to turn its attention to Zakuul.
Gonna tackle the real threat now?
It's back on the table, I wager.
The Republic makes it too easy to hurt them.
Must not have changed as much as I thought.
Meanwhile the Eternal Empire has had time to gather its strength and dig in.
I hear you. Would have been trying to squeeze blood from a stone though.
I'm tired of sitting on the sidelines and Command's out of excuses to keep me.
Thinking I might assemble another black ops team. Start hitting the hardest targets again. Maybe attach myself to an outfit that can do real damage. Know anything like that?
The Alliance could use you, Pierce.
All the truly hard targets are controlled by the Eternal Empire. You ready for that?
Never been more ready.
If being a desk jockey hasn't made you totally worthless, I might.
Coming from anyone but you, that'd be a closed casket.
I've been waiting for this, sharpening my edge. Next time you see action, I want to be there.
Soon as I've got my transfer, I'll meet your people. My CO rejects it, I might put two in his chest as a resignation and come anyway.
Republic's on the retreat. Not news to you I'll bet, but it's got the losing fronts stepping livelier.
Looks like the Pubs have worn themselves out. Losing more ground everyday.
Bloodied the Republic's nose with a few key victories. It's a start anyway.
Glad to hear it.
Between you and me, the only news we're getting is "bad" and "worse."
[Requires Participation in 20 Warzones] You're needed in the field, Pierce.
I'll do what I can.
We aren't here to drone on about facts and figures, Lieutenant. We report victories. Bloody, hard-won victories.
Get me one by twenty-two hundred or Kaas City will hear about your upcoming suicide mission to Coruscant. Dismissed.
There's a sight for sore eyes....
Kept me waiting long enough, my lord.
Have my dreams come true, or are you here to finally put me out of my misery?
You've grown comfortable in my absence.
I was more comfortable neck-deep in muck on Taris.
You don't seem all that surprised to see me.
Call it a hunch, but I knew you'd still be out there. Expected to see a report long before your face, though.
A desk, Pierce. How the mighty have fallen.
Cruel as ever, my lord.
This post is more of a fit for that bootlick of yours, Quinn, but I'm the war hero.
My "reward" for cracking the Bastion. Promotion, medals, and being trotted out as a reminder of what every grunt should aspire to.
This is no place for a soldier of your caliber.
No it isn't, my lord.
They were right to use you as an inspiration, but taking you off the battlefield was a mistake.
Can't prove it, but I suspect Moff Hurdenn had a hand in that. Damned me with praise, I'm sure.
Many would literally kill for your position.
Wish they'd hurry on with it.
Having to sit here and talk about the grand victories instead of being a part of them. It's a fate worse than death.
Bah, enough of my griping. You have business with the Outreach Bureau, or is this a personal call?
I have organized an Alliance against the Eternal Empire. Join me in crushing it.
Sounds like something you'd do. I'd love to, my lord.
After seeing you alive and well, I wanted to offer you a place at my side once more.
There's no place I'd rather be than fighting by your side, my lord.
This visit was to reclaim something I had lost. You will serve me once again.
Gladly, my lord.
I'll inform my superiors of my reassignment. Doubt anyone would be fool enough to dispute it.
Next time you see action, I want to be there.
My lord. You served on the Dark Council alongside Darth Marr. Disappeared along with him.
If you're looking for leads, bounty hunter, I only hear about the action after it's happened these days.
Wait--I know you. You were on the expedition for the Emperor. Not many survivors of that action.
Now this is interesting. You're the Intelligence officer that had Marr's ear before we made first contact with Zakuul.
Major Pierce. What brings you to the Outreach Bureau?
You've given a lot of speeches asking our people to go "above and beyond" the call of duty. How bad is it?
Bad.
I can spot a want ad when I see one. All those speeches tell me you Imps are shorthanded.
Shrewd.
Your service record is quite impressive, by the look of you. It caught my interest.
Caught a lot of people's interest. And saddled me with this sorry post.
You look like you've seen more than your share of action, Major. That interests me.
Planning to take a run at me for a quick credit? That'd actually interest me.
Pierce. I've heard that name. Why?
Could be I led the op that cracked open the Bastion on Corellia. Could be I served under the Emperor's Wrath.
These days I'm only trotted out like a blasted trophy. Idiots up top think it's good for morale. Winning is good for morale.
Seems like the Republic's given up on Zakuul and dedicated everything they've got left to kicking our hinds.
The Republic has had decades to nurture their hatred of us. Arcann's empire isn't nearly as appealing a target for their anger.
Picked a fine time to find their backbones.
Time to bring in a specialist, Major. How much is good news worth to you?
Give me something for the headlines and you can count on more than credits.
Arcann will destroy us both unless we unite against him.
He won't have to, things don't start turning around.
Then it's time we show them we will not fall so easily.
It'll take more than talk. Just makes being here even more frustrating.
Payback's a real mother, ain't it?
Goes both ways.
Empire won't be in any shape to tackle Zakuul without pushing back the Republic. Start putting wins on the board and maybe that'll change.
Hope it does. Might get me out of this stuffed shirt and back in the action. Excuse me, the Ministers are waiting.
Hope to hear more about you soon, my lord.
Start putting in your overtime, hunter.
Bring me a good op next time you're by.
Unless it's important, I've got more blasted reports to file.
[Requires Valor Rank 40] I have crushed all of the Empire's enemies!
